# options

**Instance Property**

A set of options for the query. For a list of possible values, see [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantitySeriesSampleQueryDescriptor/Options-swift.struct].

## Declaration

```swift
var options: HKQuantitySeriesSampleQueryDescriptor.Options
```

## Accessing Query Properties

- **predicate**: A predicate that defines the set of series samples that the query returns.

items.description: A predicate that defines the set of series samples that the query returns.
items.name: predicate
